name: A pure white robe with shimmering adornments
data: It increases the users wisdom impressively.
It increases the users charisma adequately.
It has tiny armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration superbly.
This item loses its magical powers extremely slowly.
It increases the users physical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users poison resistance somewhat.
It increases the users shadow resistance a bit.
It increases the users fire resistance somewhat.
